explanation: [0-0] A woman wearing pink clothes, pink gloves, and blue wrist guards is lying on a green blanket with her eyes closed. Behind her, on a green sofa, are many dolls.
[0-2] Then, a little boy in yellow clothes and a yellow hat walks in from the right and crouches beside the woman in pink.
[0-2] Then, a little boy in yellow clothes and a yellow hat walks in from the right and crouches beside the woman in pink.

[2-5] Next, the little boy in yellow stands up and a red heart appears in his hand. He then hands the heart to the woman in pink. The red heart disappears into her body. The little boy in yellow lies down in front of the green sofa, and the woman in pink raises her head.
